body_content.explanation: in or relating to the period after the Great Depression (= the decrease in wealth, industry, and employment from 1929 until the Second World War):
examples: During the post-Depression era, she moved to Los Angeles to seek work.
She remembered his smart clothes in the post-depression days.

body_content.explanation: in or relating to the period after any economic depression (= a period with very little business activity and not many jobs):
examples: They said that owning gold prior to the post-depression recovery was desirable.
